text: The Racket is a 1928 American crime drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and produced by Howard Hughes. It stars Thomas Meighan, Louis Wolheim, Marie Prevost, G. Pat Collins, Lee Moran and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1929 and was remade in 1951. ==Other websites== * Category:1928 drama movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:1920s crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: The Racket
